title: Digital Platform Projects for Strengthening Learning Experience Design (LXD) Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Designing learner-engaged digital content in smartphone-centric environments with science domain applications to strengthen entry-level expertise in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can design science domain educational scenarios by applying five user experience (UX) design principles.
Learners can develop one prototype of a learner-engagement digital platform using mobile optimization tools.
Learners can propose three improvements for science education content based on learner analytics data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
